log.text: I am looking for a place in Cambridge. It doesn't need to include internet and should be a hotel.
I was not able to find a hotel type with no internet, but there are hotels with internet.
Okay, that would be fine, as long as it has free parking.
Okay, do you have any preference on price range?
No. How many are available?
There are 8 different hotels around the city with free parking. Do you have a preference for city area or star rating?
It doesn't matter to me which part of the city it's in or it's rating. In your opinion, which one would be best for a short  3 day stay?
It's hard to say. How about the ashley hotel in the north part of town?
Is there room for 4 people on Monday?
Unfortunately I cannot book that day and time. Would you like to change the day or try a different hotel?
Can i try a different hotel?
How about the Express by Holiday Inn and Cambridge, a 2 star, or Huntingdon Marriott Hotel, a 4 star?

Hotel-Select: Express by Holiday Inn and Cambridge

span_info: Express by Holiday Inn and Cambridge

log.text: Do either of those include free parking?
Yes, they both have free parking, and internet as well. The Marriott is in the west, and Holiday Inn in the east. Does area of the city matter to you?
No, that does not matter, as long as I can book a 3 night stay for 4 people on Monday.
I was not able to book at either location, can I try something else?
What else is available?
ashley hotel is available, can i provide you more information on it?
We can try and book that one as long as free parking.  4 people for 3 nights.
The only hotel available is university arms hotel. You are booked and the reference number is YJJTTQ9X. It comes with parking and internet and is in the centre.
Thank you. I also need a train from Cambridge on Thursday.
Sure. Where are you headed to and what time would you like to leave Cambridge?
I must arrive by 12:45.
Okay!  Where are you going?
I'm going to birmingham new street.
TR2636 arrives at 11:44. Would you like to reserve seats?
That sounds good.  Can you give me the price as well? Thanks.
Sure.  The price is 75.10 pounds per ticket.
Great!  That is all I'm going to need today.  Thanks for your help!
Thank you for contacting Cambridge TownInfo centre. Goodbye!
I am looking for a attraction in the east of town.
Sure, I can help you with that.  There are plenty of attracts to the east.  Is there a specific type of attraction you are interested in?
I'm not sure right now. What are the entrance fees like?
There is cambridge artworks. The entry is also free.
I also need a train on Sunday.
What is your destination?
I am going to bishops stortford from cambridge.
At what time will you be traveling? There are 10 different trains on that day.
I'd like to arrive in bishops stortford by 15:00.
I have the TR2402 which you will arrive at 14:07. How many tickets please?
None today.  Can you just give me a price for that?
It will be 8.08 a ticket.
OKay can you book that please?
Sure, how many tickets would you like?
I would like 3 tickets please.

Booking was successful, the total fee is 24.24 GBP payable at the station. 
Reference number is: NLGC8ADU. Can I help you with anything else?
No, thank you. That is all.
Okay, I hope you have a wonderful time in cambridge. Bye!
Hi, what options are available in the south of Cambridge for upscale dining?
Is there a particular cuisine you are looking for?
I'm not picky, just let me know a few types of cuisine that are in the area please.
Peking Restaurant as well as The Good Luck Food Takeaway serve Chinese food. Taj Tandoori serves Indian, and Frankie and Benny's serves Italian. There is also a Mexican restaurant, Chiquito.
Frankie and Benny's sounds good. What is the phone number for that restaurant?
The phone number to Frankie and Bennys is 01223412430.
thank you. I also need a train to Cambridge arriving at 10:15 on Thursday.
What is your departure location?
I need to depart from Stansted
TR0031 departs Stansted Airport at 09:24 and arrives in Cambridge at 09:52. Would you like me to book it for you?
Could you please tell me the price for that train?
The ride will cost you 10.10 pounds. Can I book it for you?
No, that's all I need right now, thanks.
Great. Have a nice day!
I am hearing some good things about queens college, can you give me some basic info on them?
Queen's College is found on Silver Street, and their phone number is 01223335511. Is there anything else you'd like to know?
Yes, I'd like to know the entrance fee, please?
The entrance free is 2.50 pounds. Can I provide you with any other information?
No thanks. I also need a train leaving Cambridge on Tuesday.
Sure, I can help you with that.  Where will you be travelling to?
I'd like to go to Leicester please.
Sure, I have a number of options for you.  What time would you like to leave?
I would like to leave after 09:45. Can you book the first one available after that and give me the reference number?
Definitely. How many people will be traveling?
Just myself will be travelling.
Ok.  I was able to book one ticket.  Your reference number is M0PIMESH.
Thank you that is all I need today.
thanks for inquiring with us and have a great day
Thank you very much.
You're welcome. If we can be of further assistance, please let us know. Good-bye.
Hello!  I am looking for information about The Cambridge Belfry.  It's a hotel in Cambridge.
Certainly, it is a fantastic 4 star hotel in the west area that is very cheap with free wifi and parking! Would you like me to book it for you?
Before you book it, can I get the address of The Cambridge Belfry?
Of course! I have Back Lane, Cambourne listed as the address, is there anything else I can help with today?
No thank you, that is everything that I need.
Okay, thank you, and have a great day.
Thank you, have a great day, too.
Would you look for me to book The Cambridge Belfry for you?
Not right now. Can you recommend other places to visit in the center of town though?
I'd recommend The Man on the Moon concert hall on 2 norfolk street.
Could I get the phone number for the concert hall please?
Of course. Their phone number is 01223474144. What else can I help you with?
Nothing, that should be all today, thanks!
Thank you for contacting the Cambridge TownInfo centre.  Have a good day.
I want to find a train leaving Cambridge and going to Bishops Stortford. Can you help me?
Yes I can what time are you wanting to leave by?
We need it to leave after 17:00 on Sunday.
I have train TR6742 that leaves at 17:29 and will have you in Bishops Stortford by 18:07. Will that work for you?
Yes could you book one ticket for me and give me the reference number?
Reference number is: BVD5QP16. Is there anything else?
Perfect, thanks! Yes, actually there is one more thing. Please get me information on the huntingdon marriott hotel
It is located in the west,is expensive and has 4 stars.
Can you tell me if they have free parking?
they do have free parking.
I think that is all I need. Thank you.
You're very welcome! Have a great day!
I've really got to go. Goodbye.
Okay, let me know if I can assist with anything else.
Hello there! Could you help me find a hotel? I am looking for one that has free parking and is expensive.
Here is a list of hotels with free parking and are expensive.
I did not receive any list of hotels. Can you just pick one for me, a hotel with free parking and wifi that is upscale please.
We have the university arms hotel. It is located in centre and has wifi and parking. Would you like me to book that for you?
Yes, as long as it is expensive.  I would like to arrive on Tuesday and stay for 3 nights.  There will be 8 of us.
I'm sorry, but the hotel isn't available for you request. Would you like to try another day or shorter stay?
Can you try for 2 nights instead?
I would recommend the Huntingdon Marriott Hotel, which has what you need. Your booking reference number is FTTNX1M7. Your two night stay will begin Tuesday. Thank you!
I am also interested in visiting a college in the centre of town.  Could you help me with that?
Certainly. There are 13 colleges in the centre. Would you like more information?
Yes, please let me know the postcode and entrance fee of one in the centre area.
Christ's College is very famous, free to enter and their postcode is cb23bu. Will there be anything else?
I will need a taxi to travel between the hotel and the college. Can you handle this also?
Yes, I can. Can you please give me the time you'd like to leave or arrive by?
I would like to leave the college by 24:30 and can I also have the contact number and car type.
All right. I've booked you a black volkswagen, picking you up at 24:30 at Christ's College.  The contact number is 07324891478.  Is there anything else I can help with?
No, that's all. Thanks.
Absolutely. Thank you for contacting the help desk. Have a great day.
Hello could you give me some information on some entertainment places in the centre of Cambridge to go visit please?
I'm sorry, there are no entertainment attractions listed in the centre of Cambridge. Would you like to search for something different?
Are there any colleges?
There are many colleges! Downing College on Regent Street is a great place to visit. It's free to get in!
soundss good. what is the address and postcode?
Downing College is on Regent Street, postcode cb21dq. Can I help you with anything else?
Thank you. What is the entrance fee for Downing College?
No, there is no entrance fee, it's free to enter.
Great! Can you also help me with a place to stay, the one I'm looking for is called allenbell.
Yes, the allenbell is a 4 star guesthouse in the cheap price range on the east side of town.  Would you like me to book this for you?
Yes, for four people staying three nights starting Friday.
I've booked your party of four for three nights at Allenbell, starting Friday.  Your reference number is J597S7EH.  Would you like the address and phone number for Allenbell?
No thank you. I believe that is everything today.
Thank you for using our service. Enjoy your time here.
I'm looking for a restaurant in the north part and in cheap price range.
sure, i have a couple options for you
Great, thank you! What are they?
There is royal spice which is a indian restaurant. There is also Da vinci pizzeria which is a italian restaurant. Do you need any more information?
Please book a table for 5 at 14:30 on Wednesday at Royal Spice. I will need the reference number. I also need to find a place to stay.
I was able to book your table successfully. Your reference number is KQMXIL0Z. Now, what type of accommodations are you looking for today?
The hotel should be in the same area as the restaurant and should include free wifi.
Do you have a price range or star rating preference?
I'd like a hotel, not a guesthouse, and I'd like a 2-star place.
I found two options that meet your criteria:  Ashley Hotel and Lovell Lodge.  Which one would you like?
I would like to book the Ashley Hotel for 5 people for 2 nights.
What day would you like to start your stay?
On Wednesday please.
The hotel booking is complete. The reference number is JATTLNEH.
Great. Thank you. Goodbye
Thank you and have a wonderful day!
Can you help me find a train departing from cambridge going  to kings lynn?
of course, what day are you traveling?
I want to leave on Thursday and arrive by 14:00.
We have nine trains arriving by 14:00 that day. What time are you looking to leave by?
I don't have a specific time to leave but I do want to arrive before 14:00. How much will this cost?
The price is 9.80 pounds per ticket. would you like me to book you passage?
No thanks. Not at this time. Can you help me find a room to stay that is moderately priced?
There are a lot of moderately priced hotels. Do you have a preference on which area?
No, I don't care where it is.  I like 3 stars and I absolutely need free wifi.
Bridge guest house is a moderately priced, 3 star guesthouse with wifi in the south area. Would you like to make a reservation?
Yes, make the reservation please.
Alright, I can take care of that for you.  How many nights will you be staying?
Actually I don't need a reservation at this time.
Is there something else I can help you with then?
Nope.  That should cover it.
My pleasure.
